column1: 1) S3 Standard storage has been reduced from 150 TB to 50 TB and S3 INT has been added by 100 TB
Expectation is to add lifecycle in S3 so that cost can be reduced in S3
2) Reduced EC2 Instane Type from m5 ro m4
3) Reduced EBS volume from 100 GB to 50 GB.
Expectation is whenever there will be storage issue come AWS should send out Notification so that support team can increase of EBS volume on need.
4) Reduced Master DB Usage: Expectation is that Master DB will only be used to write data.
Increased Read Replica DB Usage: Expectation is that Application will use More often read Replica to read data from back end.
